sentences.en: Andrew had repeated what he had told the administrator earlier, at times referring to his notes.
sentences.cn: 安德鲁把刚才对管理主任讲的话又重复了一遍, 不时看看自己的提要.

sentences.en: As a nurse she got very frustrated, but being an administrator seems to suit her.
sentences.cn: 她做护士很不顺心, 但当管理人员似乎倒很适合.

sentences.en: Celia hired an administrator whose name was Nigel Bentley.
sentences.cn: 西莉亚招聘了一名管理主任,名叫奈杰尔·本特利.

sentences.en: Hamilton was a tough and brisk administrator.
sentences.cn: 汉密尔顿是一位严峻而干脆的行政官员.

sentences.en: He has proved himself capable as administrator.
He is well-intentioned but a poor administrator.
sentences.cn: 他是个空有一番好意但能力很差的主管。

sentences.en: He rejoined Sadler's Wells Royal Ballet as Assistant Administrator in 1988.
sentences.cn: 他在1988年重回萨德勒的威尔斯皇家芭蕾舞团，任行政助理。

sentences.en: He was appointed Apostolic Administrator of Minsk by Pope John Paul II.
sentences.cn: 他被教皇约翰·保罗二世任命为明斯克区的宗座署理。

sentences.en: His constant vacillation made him an unfit administrator.
sentences.cn: 他经常优柔寡断,这使他不适合当行政官员.

sentences.en: If you feel you have any cause for complaint about the service you should write to the Hospital Administrator.
sentences.cn: 如果你觉得对服务有任何不满,应该写信给医院院长.

sentences.en: On Friday the company's administrators sought permission from a Melbourne court to keep operating.
sentences.cn: 在星期五，该公司的管理人员们从一家墨尔本法院取得了继续经营的许可。

sentences.en: Since the Administrator had relied on their assessments, the error was prejudicial and reversal was required.
sentences.cn: 鉴于行政长官依赖小组成员的评估分析, 错误即是有成见的,因此作出撤销的判决.

sentences.en: The job went to Yuri Skokov, a capable administrator.
sentences.cn: 尤里·斯科科夫得到了这份工作，他是一位能干的管理人员。

sentences.en: The role of administrator absorbed much of Ben's energy.
sentences.cn: 行政职务耗掉本很多精力.

sentences.en: They were in the hospital administrator's office with the door closed.
sentences.cn: 他们坐在医院管理主任的办公室里,门紧闭着.

sentences.en: This whole city is a monument to his skill as a planner and administrator.
sentences.cn: 这整座城市经他亲自设计并管理,正是对他的才能的纪念.

words.tran_cn: 管理；行政；实施；行政机构
给予帮助；执行遗产管理人的职责；担当管理人

phrases.tran_cn: 数据库管理员；数据库管理程序
医院管理；医院治理；院务主任

trans.tran_cn: 管理者，有管理（或行政）才能的人，[法]（由遗嘱检验法庭指定的）遗产管理人，地产管理人
trans.tran_en: someone whose job involves managing the work of a company or organization
